templates.description: 根据采购订单号查询合同名称
templates.sql: SELECT CON_NAME AS 合同名称 FROM DWD_MAT_CON_ITEM WHERE PUR_ODR_CODE = ${order_no}

templates.description: 某合同的预付比例（按合同名称过滤）
templates.sql:
SELECT item.PUR_ODR_CODE AS 采购订单号, item.CON_NAME AS 合同名称, erp.DPPCT AS 预付比例
FROM DWD_MAT_CON_ITEM item
INNER JOIN UN01_03_ERP_CD_EKPO erp ON item.PUR_ODR_CODE = erp.EBELN
WHERE item.CON_NAME = ${contract_name}

templates.description: 某合同的预付到期日（按合同名称过滤）
templates.sql:
SELECT item.PUR_ODR_CODE AS 采购订单号, item.CON_NAME AS 合同名称, erp.DPDAT AS 预付到期日
FROM DWD_MAT_CON_ITEM item
INNER JOIN UN01_03_ERP_CD_EKPO erp ON item.PUR_ODR_CODE = erp.EBELN
WHERE item.CON_NAME = ${contract_name}

templates.description: 某合同的预付款金额（按合同名称过滤）
templates.sql:
SELECT item.PUR_ODR_CODE AS 采购订单号, item.CON_NAME AS 合同名称, erp.DPAMT AS 预付款金额
FROM DWD_MAT_CON_ITEM item
INNER JOIN UN01_03_ERP_CD_EKPO erp ON item.PUR_ODR_CODE = erp.EBELN
WHERE item.CON_NAME = ${contract_name}

templates.description: 根据工程名称找到对应合同名称
templates.sql:
WITH req AS (
  SELECT DISTINCT PROV_REQ_CODE
  FROM DWD_MAT_PUR_REQ_ITEM_BIDPKG
  WHERE SINGLE_ENG_NAME = ${project_name}
),
po AS (
  SELECT DISTINCT e.EBELN
  FROM UN01_03_ERP_CD_EKPO e
  INNER JOIN req r ON e.BANFN = r.PROV_REQ_CODE
)
SELECT DISTINCT c.CON_NAME AS 合同名称
FROM DWD_MAT_CON_ITEM c
INNER JOIN po p ON c.PUR_ODR_CODE = p.EBELN

templates.description: 根据采购申请号获取大中小类及目录规则
templates.sql:
WITH req AS (
  SELECT DISTINCT wlbm
  FROM dws_ast_zcqsm_wzsj_cgsq_info_mf
  WHERE cgsq = ${req_no}
),
mat AS (
  SELECT m.mat_code, m.max_class_name, m.mid_class_name, m.min_class_name
  FROM dws_ast_zcqsm_wlfwzsj_info_mf m
  INNER JOIN req r ON m.mat_code = r.wlbm
)
SELECT DISTINCT
  idx.zssfw  AS 实施范围,
  idx.zcgfs  AS 建议采购方式,
  idx.zcgzzfs AS 建议采购组织方式,
  idx.zcgml  AS 国网省网目录,
  idx.zyjfl  AS 一级分类（配置）, idx.zejfl AS 二级分类（配置）, idx.zdydj AS 电压等级（配置）, idx.zzyxf AS 专业细分（配置）
FROM dim_cst_zcqsm_cgml_index idx
INNER JOIN mat
  ON idx.zwzdl = mat.max_class_name AND idx.zwzzl = mat.mid_class_name AND idx.zwzxl = mat.min_class_name

templates.description: 按建议采购方式在批次表中挑最近的计划编号（截止日期最近且未过期）
templates.sql:
SELECT zzbjhbh AS 计划编号, zzbjhmc1 AS 计划名称, zzbjzrq AS 计划申报截止时间, zzbsbfs AS 招标方式, zzbnd AS 年份
FROM ods_erp_p00_sapsr3_ztmmjy_tw_zbpc
WHERE zzbsbfs = ${method} AND zzbjzrq >= CURRENT_DATE
ORDER BY zzbjzrq ASC
FETCH FIRST 1 ROW ONLY
notes: 现库无“批次采购/非批次”字段，本模板只按招标方式+最近截止日筛选
